DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The aim trial compare pharmacokinetics ( rate body eliminate substance body ) insulin aspart fast-acting insulin human follow intravenous ( IV ) infusion intramuscular ( IM ) injection Japanese subject type 1 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Insulin Aspart With Fast-acting Insulin Human Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus ( diagnose clinically ) least 12 month Treated multiple daily insulin injection least 12 month Current daily basal insulin requirement equal 0.3 U/kg/day Glycosylated haemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) equal 10.0 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.028.0 kg/m^2 Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior trial start ( screen ) Surgery trauma significant blood loss ( 500 mL ) within 3 month prior trial start ( screen ) Subject smoke 10 cigarette equivalent per day Not able willing refrain smoking use nicotine gum transdermal nicotine patch inpatient period
